Event Hub

An event hub is a concept that enables developers to get access to real-time business events from one developer portal.

With access to real-time events, developers will be empowered to quickly and easily integrate new tools, systems, platforms, and even businesses giving your company the agility it needs to compete in this fast paced connected world.

B2B API Gateway

The majority of B2B processes are by their nature asynchronous and event-driven. A transaction occurs in a processing system (e.g. your ERP system) and that triggers a message to be sent to a partner.

This makes webhook APIs a perfect fit for B2B messaging. Not only are they a perfect fit but they add value over existing technologies that are used in this space (such as EDI).

With consumers able to discover and self-serve their subscriptions, it makes onboarding a much faster and smoother process for both the provider and consumer. Critical to using a webhook API solution for B2B purposes is security and robustness.

With security and robustness at the heart of webhookie, it makes it the right choice for your B2B webhook API solution.

Data Synchronization

One of the main challenges organizations have is ensuring data is retrieved from the system of record, rather than another intermediary source.

Using a webhook API to make your data discoverable, from the system of record, makes it easy for your developers to get the data from the right source in a manner that is fast and efficient. This reduces friction and adds agility to your IT department.

Another challenge with data synchronization is keeping track of all the systems that are receiving your systems data.

Using a webhook API platform like webhookie will give you full oversight over which systems are receiving your data.

Process automation

In the modern business world, it’s critical to get an edge on your competition. Being more efficient than your competition is one of the best ways allowing you to offer higher quality at a lower price.

With that in mind, now imagine a world where all your real-time business events can be made easily discoverable to your developers so that they can quickly and easily subscribe to them and start automating the individual steps in a process.

Another challenge with data synchronization is keeping track of all the systems that are receiving your systems data.

We are making the events easy to discover, fast to integrate, and without compromise in security.

Real-time business intelligence

The days of monthly, weekly, or even daily business intelligence reports are at an end. Businesses demand real-time intelligence on how their business is operating and what their customers are experiencing.

To provide true real-time business intelligence a business needs to have a foundation of real-time data that can be subscribed to with minimal effort. This is what a webhook API platform like webhookie can give your business.

This is what a webhook API platform like webhookie can give your business.

Fast and easy access to real-time events informing your business brain.
